spell_list.description: Mystical Field surrounds the sorcerer in arcane magicks, preventing them from being hit with Area of Effect abilities and being interrupted and allowing them to cast while moving for a short duration. Any enemy entering the field around the sorcerer will take magic damage. This spell drains power at a prodigious rate and can be toggled off early.  If the caster enters PVP combat, the duration of this effect will be reduced.
spell_list.description_pvp: Mystical Field surrounds the sorcerer in arcane magicks, preventing them from being hit with Area of Effect abilities and being interrupted and allowing them to cast while moving for a short duration. Any enemy entering the field around the sorcerer will take magic damage. This spell drains power at a prodigious rate and can be toggled off early.  If the caster enters PVP combat, the duration of this effect will be reduced.

effect_list.description: Inflicts 36 magic damage on targets in Area of Effect
Hits a maximum of 8 targets at 15 meters base radius
Prevents caster from being Interrupted due to movement

spell_list.name: Mystical Field
